member.name: F:Strike.Options.Tables
member.summary: https://github.com/chjj/marked#tables Enable GFM tables. This option requires the gfm option to be true.

member.name: F:Strike.Options.Breaks
member.summary: Enable GFM line breaks. This option requires the gfm option to be true. https://github.com/chjj/marked#breaks

member.name: F:Strike.Options.Pedantic
member.summary: Conform to obscure parts of markdown.pl as much as possible. Don't fix any of the original markdown bugs or poor behavior. https://github.com/chjj/marked#pedantic

member.name: F:Strike.Options.Sanitize
member.summary: Sanitize the output. Ignore any HTML that has been input. Default: false https://github.com/chjj/marked#sanitize

member.name: F:Strike.Options.SmartLists
member.summary: Use smarter list behavior than the original markdown. Default: true https://github.com/chjj/marked#smartlists

member.name: F:Strike.Options.SmartyPants
member.summary: Use "smart" typograhic punctuation for things like quotes and dashes. Default: false https://github.com/chjj/marked#smartypants

member.name: M:Strike.V8.Markdownify.GetContructionJs(Strike.Options,Strike.RenderMethods)
member.summary: Get the js to construct a new marked renderer.

member.name: M:Strike.V8.Markdownify.GetMarkedJsText
member.summary: Get the content of marked.js By default marked.js is read from an embedded resource.
